Race.SpecificTitle: Member of School Board -- District B
Chief of Police -- Town of Erath
Hospital Svc. Dist. No. 3 -- 7 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 3 PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 7 MILLS PROPERTY TAX (HERETOFORE LEVIED FOR THE PURPOSE OF PAYING DEBT SERVICE ON THE OUTSTANDING GENERAL OBLIGATION REFUNDING BONDS, SERIES 1997, OF THE DISTRICT) FOR IMPROVING AND MAINTAINING THE BUILDINGS AND CAPITAL FACILITIES OF THE DISTRICT AND ACQUIRING FURNISHINGS AND EQUIPMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 3 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a tax of seven (7) mills (heretofore levied for the purpose of paying debt service on the outstanding General Obligation Refunding Bonds, Series 1997, of the District) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of improving and maintaining the buildings and capital facilities of the District and acquiring furnishings and equipment therefor?
